verbs.description: [V: surfing] [ARG1: most hallowed and beautiful ritual] [ARGM-TMP: last week] the world most revered big wave surfers joined hands in a floating circle at the mouth of oahu waimea bay while hundreds of people watched from the beach the ocean gently rocked the eddie eddie aikau isla vista santa barbara california waimea bay hawaii
